values.en: an examination of sb's knowledge or ability, consisting of questions for them to answer or activities for them to perform
a medical examination to discover what is wrong with you or to check the condition of your health
an experiment to discover whether or how well sth works, or to find out more information about it
a situation or an event that shows how good, strong, etc. sb/sth is
to put sb/sth in a situation which will show what their or its true qualities are
to prove to be good, popular, etc. over a long period of time
to find out how much sb knows, or what they can do by asking them questions or giving them activities to perform

values.cn: 在知识或能力测试中表现不错／糟糕
values.en: to perform well/badly in a test of knowledge or ability
to examine the blood, a part of the body, etc. to find out what is wrong with a person, or to check the condition of their health
to use or try a machine, substance, etc. to find out how well it works or to find out more information about it

values.cn: （机器或产品）测试结果良好／很差
values.en: (of a machine or product) to perform well/badly in a test of how well it works
to be difficult and therefore need all your strength, ability, etc.
to find out what the situation is before doing sth or making a decision

sentences.en: Finland's teens score extraordinarily high on an international test. American educators are trying to figure out why.
sentences.cn: 芬兰青少年在国际学生测试中成绩突出，美国教育家想问问为什么。

sentences.en: Strain in the brain gives it a fatigue test which helps evaluate your mental stamina and capacity.
sentences.cn: 用脑过度是对你的精神耐力及智能进行评估的疲劳试验。

sentences.en: When it did, I first gave it a test run to see that everything was working proberly.
sentences.cn: 光盘到手后，我没有急着卸载重装，而是决定先试装一下看能不能通过。

sentences.en: You'll use each of the above functions in the next section as you formulate the form that you'll create to test the XForms PHP library.
sentences.cn: 在下一节中，您将使用上面的各个函数设置用于测试XFormsPHP库的表单（稍后创建）。

sentences.en: This has also been a test of China, though in a way the country seems not to understand.
sentences.cn: 这也考验着中国，虽然在某种程度上，这个国家似乎对此并不理解。

sentences.en: You've been selected to be part of an elite group to help test Hellgate: London, the highly-anticipated Action-RPG from Flagship Studios!
sentences.cn: 您已经被选中作为一个精英团体中的一员来协助测试“地狱之门：伦敦”，一款由旗舰工作室出品的受到很高期待的动作RPG游戏！

sentences.en: Darfur ex-girlfriend although she said the test results are negative, but she asked Alomar to her mental anguish caused by compensation.
sentences.cn: 前女友达尔称虽然她的检查结果是阴性的，不过她要求阿洛玛对她所造成的精神损失进行赔偿。

sentences.en: The problem is, at this point, we have no way to see what our test results are.
sentences.cn: 此时我们面临的问题是没有办法看到测试结果。

sentences.en: I tried to test him a little bit, see if he could go left, go right, that sort of thing.
sentences.cn: 我试了试他，看他能不能左突右冲，就这么试他。

sentences.en: At the beginning of the test, the fish did not know where to go, and they chose randomly.
sentences.cn: 测试开始时，鱼不知道往哪里游，它们随机选择。
